chargeHist.descr: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Rindal was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.23(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Polk County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: $290.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Failure to pay will result in civil judgment.

Subject to Work Release & Good Time.
Concurrent with: with other matter

Must provide DNA sample.  No surcharge.
May not vote or hold public office until civil rights are restored.  Other civil rights may be lost until restored.
If not a US citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.

records.addlTxt: Voucher to DOA for Polk Co Treas to pay $812.00 Ct Appted Atty Fees. No reimbursement required.
Atty Mark Biller
Affidavit of Adversary Counsel Fees
Associated with Charge #1

Defendant Michael J Rindal in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Defendant Michael J Rindal in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 9:28 am.  Biller-reinterate motion to withdraw NGI which was filed 12/9.  CT-accepted by the court.  Def waiving right to prelim hearing.  CT finds PC, def bound over.  Information filed.  
No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
Count 1-guilty plea.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.  Waiver of PSI.  
SENTENCE:  9 mo PCJ, subj to WR & GT, concurrent w/ other matter.  $290.60 fine/costs.  Must provide DNA sample, no surcharge.  60 dtp or set pp, ftp-judgment.  No sentence credit.  PCR.  10:06 am adj.
Plea hearing at 03-04-2016 09:00 am
